name: Bulk Actions for Product Feed for Google
author: Plugin Territory

sections.description:
Adds bulk action to WooCommerce Product Feed.

This plugin enables hidding/showing product via bulk actions.

Please notice that WooCommerce Product Feed must be installed and active.

  • https://woocommerce.com/products/google-product-feed/
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress’ built-in Add New Plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Go to Produtcs
  4. Enjoy bulk actions for hiding/showing products
sections.faq:
Do I need another plugin

  • Yes, this plugin extends WooCommerce Product Feed https://woocommerce.com/products/google-product-feed/.

short_description: Adds bulk actions for hiding/showing Google feed products via WooCommerce Product Feed.
